Title: 161: Using AI to Automate Communication
Description:
In this episode of the SuperDataScience Podcast, I chat with the Founder and Chief Technology Officer of Kylie.AI, Sinan Ozdemir. You will hear about Feature Engineering and why it is vital in interpreting and analyzing data models; you will also hear about Automated Customer Care Services and its importance in the future of enterprises, and get insights on why humans should ensure that AI is ethically responsible when serving humanity.


If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, resources, and more at www.superdatascience.com/161
